Developer Terms of Use
des:
Hands-free control of your Rogo devices from any room of the house. 

With the Rogo skill and Alexa, you can now interact with your lights, rooms, and scenes, recipes and colors. 
To get started, select the "Enable Skill" button in the Alexa App to link your Philips Hue account and say, "Alexa, discover devices”. 

Rooms: 
To control several lights in the same room, simply tell Alexa to turn on <room name> . 
- “Alexa, turn on Bedroom”.
- “Alexa, brighten Kitchen to 60%”.
 
Light Controls:
- You can turn devices on/off, for example: “Alexa, turn on my Bedroom lights” or “Alexa, turn off the Kitchen lights” or simply “Alexa, turn on the light”.
- You can change the brightness, for example: "Alexa, brighten Dining Room to 60%".

Color Control:
- offers possibilities to change or set colors with Rogo Sun. Say, "Alexa, set the bedroom light to orange"
- You can also control shades of white on your Rogo Sun white ambiance lights, from cool energising daylight to relaxing warm white light. Say: "Alexa, set the kitchen light to cool white"
